name: IRIX Design
description:
IRIX Design Group has a diverse range of marketing, advertising and design capabilities, including but not limited to: design and copywriting, website development, online marketing and advertising, corporate identity, radio production and media planning.
Our expertise lies in marketing for the real estate, financial, tourism, retail, and hospitality sectors. We also specialize in marketing to Asian audiences, creating and adapting materials to reach out to the desired target market.
